cast.name: 福里斯特·惠特克 Forest Whitaker
理查德·达历山德罗 Richard D'Alessandro
克雷格·迪弗朗西亚 Craig DiFrancia
小伊万德·杜克 Evander Duck Jr.
阿瑟·J·纳斯加勒拉 Arthur J. Nascarella
迈克尔·雷蒙德-詹姆斯 Michael Raymond-James

writer.name: 克里斯·布兰卡托 Chris Brancato

introduction: Created by Chris Brancato and Paul Eckstein, and starring and executive produced by Oscar® winner Forest Whitaker, Godfather Of Harlem is inspired by the story of infamous crime boss Bumpy Johnson (Whitaker), who in the early 1960s returned from eleven years in prison to find the neighborhood he once ruled in shambles.  With the streets controlled by the Italian mob, Bumpy must take on the Genovese crime family to regain control. During the brutal battle, he forms an alliance with radical preacher Malcolm X – catching Malcolm’s political rise in the crosshairs of social upheaval and a mob war that threatens to tear the city apart. Godfather Of Harlem is a collision of the criminal underworld and the civil rights movement during one of the most tumultuous times in American history.
